messages.message: for reference, also had it in this CI run: https://jenkins.instabase.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/instabase/detail/PR-71397/6/pipeline (June 16)

This is due to restarting the pipeline from a specific stage, which doesn't play nice with almost any job with more than one stage. :sweat_smile:

Particularly for pre-merge, there's no benefit in using the 'restart from stage' link, just use `Rebuild` or `Build now` for a cleaner state :+1:

Also, just to advertise some of the new diagnostic bits for pre-merge, here's the quick-view dashboard for the most recent completed run of this PR:
https://grafana.infra.instabase.com/d/ci-pre-merge-quick-view/pre-merge-quick-view?var-pr_[â€¦]0a1b79de2a&orgId=1&from=now-24h&to=now&timezone=browser (https://grafana.infra.instabase.com/d/ci-pre-merge-quick-view/pre-merge-quick-view?var-pr_num=71397&var-job_num=8&var-trace_id=2e0389ed2f531297150b420a1b79de2a&orgId=1&from=now-24h&to=now&timezone=browser)
